channel.title: How do i make NPC's talk?
channel.description:
How can i make NPC's talk? Like if it sold Dragon Weapons, for it to say DRAGON WEAPONS SOLD HERE!!
Also im on a Delta source.

item.title: How do i make NPC's talk?
item.dc:creator: @Jaffa12 Jaffa12
item.description:
@Jaffa12 wrote:

TYVM Spyman. Sorry to be such a noob havent done this in a year or so, most things i remember but to be honest didnt think it would be the same.

Ty.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make NPC's talk?
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

Go to NPCHANDLER.java And search for “AttackNPC(i);”

You will see like this

} else if (npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc == true) { AttackNPC(i); }
Put under it This

if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) { npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement(); } if (npcs[i].npcType == Npc ID) { if (misc.random2(5) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "What you want it to say"; } }

Read full topic
